column1: Funeral services are scheduled for Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 AM at Morgan's Funeral Home in Princeton with Bro. Bobby Dean Cotton officiating assisted by Bro. Daniel Freaser. Burial will follow in Princeton Memorial Gardens with Jess Aldridge officiating.   Visitation will be held from 4:00 PM to 8:00 PM Monday at the funeral home.
